name: Bijoy Kar
headlines: Full Stack Web Developer 🕸️ | Student at Swami Vivekananda University 👨‍🎓 | Python 🐍 , JavaScript ⚙️ | Machine Learning / AI 🤖
about: I am a student at Swami Vivekananda University. I am pursuing my bachelor's degree in Computer Science (B.Tech) and hope to become a software engineer in the future. My hobbies include playing video games, and listening to music.
